description: for depositing SICX collateral, the user will receive 10 XP per USD value of the collateral deposited that day. It will be done daily (per chain period)
title: deposit sICX collateral

description: for minting bnUSD, the user will receive 30 XP per bnUSD loan held per day. It will be done daily (per chain period)
title: holding a loan

description: for locking into the saving rates, the user will receive 10 XP per USD value locked per day. It will be done daily (per chain period)
title: locking into saving rates

description: for depositing AVAX collateral, the user will receive 10 XP per USD value of the collateral deposited that day. It will be done daily (per chain period)
title: deposit AVAX collateral
